      • getRecipients

        protected java.util.List<java.lang.String> getRecipients(java.lang.String outcome)
                                                  throws ObserverException
        Default implementation: If outcome is "Assigned", send only to assignee's email. Otherwise, if Notice Groups attribute is present, the groups so specified are unioned with any recipients resulting from evaluation of the Recipients Expression attribute. If no Notice Groups are specified, any workgroups associated with the task are added to the Recipients Expression outcome.
        Throws:
        ObserverException
